ehi anathuru angawim sanatha wi atha. es.ji.pi. nayaka kristof wandrayer eeefdi hi nagimata padaka wu deshapalana kumanthranaya pilibanda ohuge agana helidarawwen liya athi paridi: nasiwadaya yukthi sahagatha kirima saha samajawadi wamata erehiwa satan kirima yana eeefdi ye mulika piliweth dekata anukulathwaya dakwima, sandhanaye awi gabadawe athyawashya angayaki. 2018 di aandukrama wyawasthawa surakime karyalaya [warfasungschuts] lesa handinwena jarmaniye rahas oththu sewaya wisin aanduwe anumathiya sahithawa idiripath karana lada warthawata anuwa es.ji.piya, sammuthi wirahithawa eeefdiyata wiruddha wimath, militariwadaya saha dhaneshwara wirodhi samajawadi wadapiliwelak wenuwen peni sitimath matha ‚Äúnirikshanayata yatath sanwidhanayak‚Äú lesa namkara thibuni.
me para sanwidhayakayinge awadhanaya yomu wela thiyenne hayiti hi wipathata path wechcha minissu.

dakunudiga siriyawa sambandhayen athi karagath yuda muktha kalapa giwisuma siriyanu arabi hamudawa wisin ullanghanaya karamin sitina bawata eksath janapadaya ella karana chodana amathya law row wisin prathikshepa kaleya.dakunudiga siriyawe yuda muktha kalapayen 40% tharam bhumi pradeshayak jabath fatah al-sham(hayat tarir al-sham sanwidhanaya amathana thawath namayak)saha islamiya rajya thrasthawadin wisin palanaya karana athara dakunudiga yuda muktha kalapaya sambandhawa eksath janapadaya,rusiyawa saha jordanaya pamini ekangathawaya kriyawata nanwa thrasthawadinta burulak nodakwa digatama katayuthu kala yuthu yayi amathyawaraya kiya.

siya meheyum karyakshamatha wadi diyunu kirimata gena athi piyawara, suparikshakari piriwaya kalamanakarana prathipaththi ha aadayam padaka piriwaya awama wima piyawara aadiya hethuwen meheyum ha mulya piriwaya pasugiya warshaye adala kala simawata wada pahala mattamakin kalamanakaranaya kara ganimata hakiyawa labi thibe.pasugiya masa nawayaka kalaya athulatha rupiyal biliyana 37.47 ka aadayamak wartha kara athi athara pulul patha ha piyo tiwi sabandatha ema aadayama wadath wadi diyunu kirimata samath wi atha.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
